title: Calories in Hot Chocolate Drink
meta_description: Discover calories in hot chocolate drink for a standard 8 oz serving, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and preparation tweaks to fit your diet.
assumptions: Standard 8 oz (240 ml) serving made with whole milk, cocoa powder, and sugar; no whipped cream or extras.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by milk type, brand of mix, added sugar, and serving size. Check labels for precise values.

quick_answer.text: One 8 oz cup of hot chocolate drink has about 190 kcal, with 25 g carbs and 8 g protein.

label_note: Values align with standard Nutrition Facts labels for comparison.

tweaks.label: Use skim milk instead of whole milk
Made with water and powder mix (no milk)

faqs.q: How many calories in a cup of hot chocolate drink?
faqs.a: About 190 kcal for an 8 oz serving with whole milk.

faqs.q: Is hot chocolate high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, typically 23 g sugars per cup due to added sweeteners.

faqs.q: What's the protein in hot chocolate drink?
faqs.a: Around 8 g per cup, mostly from the milk.

faqs.q: How to make low-calorie hot chocolate?
faqs.a: Use skim milk or a sugar-free mix to reduce calories to 100-140 kcal.
